This repo contains the materials for a small R lesson about the perks of writing R functions.

## Important

Before or at the beginning of the lesson click on the Binder button [![Binder](https://mybinder.org/badge_logo.svg)](https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/ALanguillaume/writing-functions-perks/HEAD) to launch a Rstudio session in your internet browser. We will use it for interactive quizzes !
